input_text:
Job Title: CPR Territory Manager, EMS

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Locations: Minneapolis, MN; Remote, WI, United States of America

Resuscitation

At ZOLL, we're passionate about improving patient outcomes and helping save lives.

We provide innovative technologies that make a meaningful difference in people's lives. Our medical devices, software and related services are used worldwide to diagnose and treat patients suffering from serious cardiopulmonary and respiratory conditions.

The Acute Care Technology division of ZOLL develops and delivers innovative lifesaving products and software solutions to EMS, hospital, public safety, and military customers globally. Our dedicated employees take pride in their commitment to improving patient outcomes while delivering world-class customer service.

At ZOLL, you won’t just have a job. You’ll have a career—and a purpose.

Join our team. It’s a great time to be a part of ZOLL!

Job Summary

ZOLL is a growing, innovation-driven company on the forefront of delivering medical devices to save lives, and software solutions to improve efficiency. With customers in more than 140 countries, we continue to expand our reach, as well as our product offerings. Hospitals, emergency medical services (EMS), and others trust us to provide high-quality products and exceptional customer service. ZOLL products are used every day across the globe to save the lives of people who suffer sudden cardiac arrest. From Real CPR Help® technology-an industry first-to the world's only wearable defibrillator, our capabilities and features set us apart. But none of this would be possible without the motivation and dedication of ZOLL employees, and we're invested in their success.

Essential Functions

Maintain short range and long-term plans for developing sales in the assigned territory. These plans should include an annual business plan.Uncover new business opportunities and develop and keep up to date an adequate pipeline of potential sales to meet territory sales expectations.Provide the required In-Service education to customers.Ensure the proper technical scope review has been conducted prior to sale.Maintain organized account records, including account profiles, in the company CRM, Salesforce.com.Provide various reports as required by management that will include, but are not limited to, weekly expense reports, monthly and quarterly forecasts, and regular and up-to-date activity reporting.Maintain and track demo and evaluation inventory and document the use thereof in Salesforce.com. In addition, equipment must be maintained and presented in good working manner. Each Territory Manager is financially responsible for the equipment assigned to them.Coordinate your efforts with those of the Territory Managers in your territory to ensure effective use of time and keep redundancy and inefficiency to a minimum.


Required/Preferred Education And Experience

College degree preferred2-4 years of outside selling experience required andPrior experience travelling and working in a matrix reporting structure required andPrior experience working collaboratively in a team selling environment structure required andPrior clinical experience preferred


Knowledge, Skills And Abilities

Experience or ability to work as part of a collaborative sales organizationKnowledge of ZOLL and competitive productsStrategic and customer-oriented selling skillsAbility to effectively present complex ideas and subjects, both in writing and verbally.Ability to effectively present in front of an audience with clarity.Professional and ethical behavior and characterOrganizational/Territory Time Management skillsGood interpersonal, analytical, and communication skillsTechnical and clinical knowledge to speak competently about ZOLL productsExcellent computer skills. (Microsoft Word, Excel & Power Point, CRM systems)


Travel Requirements

75% Travel required


Physical Demands

Ability to lift 50 lbs


ZOLL is a fast-growing company that operates in more than 140 countries around the world. Our employees are inspired by a commitment to make a difference in patients' lives, and our culture values innovation, self-motivation and an entrepreneurial spirit. Join us in our efforts to improve outcomes for underserved patients suffering from critical cardiopulmonary conditions and help save more lives.

ZOLL Medical Corporation appreciates and values diversity. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer M/F/D/V.

ADA: The employer will make reasonable accommodations in compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: CPR Territory Manager, EMS
output_json.summary: A full-time position at ZOLL focusing on business development and sales in the EMS sector.
job_responsibilities: Maintain short range and long-term plans for developing sales in the assigned territory.
Uncover new business opportunities and develop and maintain an adequate pipeline of potential sales.
Conduct proper technical scope review before sale.
Maintain organized account records in Salesforce.com.
Provide various reports as required by management.
Maintain and track demo and evaluation inventory.
Coordinate efforts with other Territory Managers to ensure effective use of time.
output_json.company_information: ZOLL Medical Corporation is a global company focused on saving lives through medical devices and software solutions.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: ZOLL Medical Corporation is an equal opportunity employer, considering race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, and status as a protected veteran.
